abstract: The artist Tom Sachs will present "SPACE PROGRAM 2.0: Mars."
snippet: The artist Tom Sachs will present "SPACE PROGRAM 2.0: Mars."
lead_paragraph: Over the years the Park Avenue Armory has transformed its cavernous drill hall into everything including a science-fiction fun house and a landscape created from 30 tons of discarded clothing. For its next act the New York artist Tom Sachs will offer "SPACE PROGRAM 2.0: Mars,'' his fictional mission to the planet. The project is a presentation of the Armory and Creative Time.

headline.main: Park Avenue Armory Will be Setting for Trip to Mars
